_comment: Weather configuration for ESP32 Photo Frame
_instructions: 1. Copy this file to your SD card as 'weather_config.json', 2. Set enabled=true, 3. Update latitude/longitude for your location, 4. Adjust settings as needed
_location_note: Find your coordinates at: https://www.latlong.net/ or use your phone's GPS

_settings_explanation.enabled: Set to true to enable weather display
_settings_explanation.update_interval_minutes: How often to check for weather updates (15-1440 minutes)
_settings_explanation.celsius: true for Celsius, false for Fahrenheit
_settings_explanation.battery_threshold: Disable weather below this battery percentage (5-50%)
_settings_explanation.max_age_hours: Max age before weather data is considered stale (1-24 hours)
